actions.title: Add Row to Full indicateur table

properties.display_name: Add Row to Full indicateur table

properties.script:
import base64
import sys

message = sys.argv[1]+":"+sys.argv[2]
message_bytes = message.encode('ascii')
base64_bytes = base64.b64encode(message_bytes)
base64_message = base64_bytes.decode('ascii')

print(base64_message)

properties.script:
import json, sys
list1  = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
list_set = set(list1)
unique = []
unique_list = (list(list_set))
for x in unique_list:
    unique.append(x)
